motivational_quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivational_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

motivational_quotes.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
motivational_quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

motivational_quotes.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
motivational_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

motivational_quotes.quote: If you have never failed, you have never lived.
motivational_quotes.author: Unknown

motivational_quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
motivational_quotes.author: Walt Disney

motivational_quotes.quote: The road to excellence is always under construction.
motivational_quotes.author: Lao Tzu
